posts.content:
Here for sale is my 1966 split screen single that's had a complete restoration back to the day she left the factory and matching to the birth certificate including the steering lock hell yer she's rare lol,she realy is a class of her own
She's a left hooker imported from Sweden original drop sides original front clip,all rust was cut out and replaced all waxed in between panels,she's a 1500 engine,that's had a rebuild,comes complete with new ash hoops,bows and canvas
And includes a side awning for her,the sign writting was done professionally and I'm told it can be removed but personally I think it adds to her,she's just had mot and is ready for a years driving,i would estimate she's don't no more than a 700 miles since her restoration and in total 3 vw shows,right now for the bad bits she dosent get used due to the fact that I'm restoring a grade two house so she spends all her time locked away,she is showing signs of ware on the drop side hooks that the canvas clips onto, the front brake hast developed a mouse lol since the mot ( sqeak) the fuel gauge has a mind of its own
Thats about it really a beautiful bus thats a joy of living the dream to drive viewing welcome
Now for what I think she's worth and what she owes me Â£19 k Ono

Hello, stunning van! Is it still for sale.?
Thanks
John


Sent from my iPad using Tapatalk
Is it returning to the UK and will it be for sale then?

no,it is not coming back to the UK
we went to pick it up 2 weeks ago.
the son off my brother in law bought it.
not only his first splitscreen,but his very first car.
not bad to start with.

henk!!!

Lucky, lucky man. Thanks for the info.

John
